data.title: OpenSoundscape
data.description: software ecosystem for analyzing bioacoustics recordings, training, and applying convolutional neural network classifiers
data.taxonomic or sound type specialization,: any sound; specific tool for classification of repeating sounds (e.g. trills)
data.annotation: process Raven sound software annotation files
data.sound processing features: audio manipulations, e.g. bandpass and sound augmentation for convolutional neural network training
data.detector features: signal processing for sounds with repeating structure (e.g. trills)
data.classifier features: create a wide variety of deep learning networks for classification of animal sounds; parallelize classification over CPUs or GPUs
